data.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts
data.author: Winston S. Churchill

data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
data.author: Herman Melville

data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
data.author: Colin R. Davis

data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
data.author: Tony Hsieh

data.quote: Be willing to go all out, in pursuit of your dream. Ultimately it will pay off. You are more powerful than you think you are. Go for it.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Listen to yourself the voice that’s in your Heart not your head,it will lead you to your Goal.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Other people’s opinion of you does not have to become your reality
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: You don’t have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: It has been said,most people die at age 25 and don’t get buried until they are 65.Make an effort to live your life to the fullest
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: The greatest revenge is massive success.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Live out of your imagination instead of out of your memory
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill
